Author: rail
Name: AetherBreaker
Punchline: A game to play when dead.
Description: Opens on death, or /abreaker. A Puzzle Bobble clone mini-game.
Changelog:
v2.0.0.0: Major architectural rework to fix all UI scaling issues.
- Decoupled game logic from rendering using an abstract unit system.
- Fixed numerous gameplay bugs including the star power-up, bubble snapping/overlap, and multiplayer junk/refill logic.
- Added single-player difficulty ramp (fewer colors on early stages).
- Enabled aiming helper line by default for the first two stages.
